title: An example of SGI's negotiated truth
content:
http://www.iop.or.jp/Documents/1424/SGI-Malaysia.pdf
and elsewhere:
Daisaku Ikeda: Nichiren would sit down with Mohammad and they would discuss bringing peace to the world. I guess, as SGI leader Joan Anderson once concluded, "the truth must be negotiated." The reality is, Mohammad would have attempted to cut off the Buddha's and Nichiren's head as did Mohammad's followers cut off the heads of Buddhists in Nalanda and throughout India during the Middle Ages.
